data.name: The Last Hero
data.detailed_description:
Story

Many years ago, a brave hero defeated Rorudark, an evil wizard that tried to destroy the world. Rorudark was trapped in the depths of the world, but centuries later his anger and extreme power set him free, and how revenge Rorudark cursed all the animals and creatures in the world, which are now attacking people. Now our last hope is you, The Last Hero!


A precise platformer full of action

- The Last Hero is an incredible adventure for one player, in an immersive world and with challenging stages!
- Double jump, crouch, climb walls and attack your enemies to pass the levels!
- The game has 100 different and lovely levels, in a total of 10 different worlds!
- 30 different items, with 11 powerful swords to buy and use!
- A total of 30 different enemies, with challenging and immersive fights!
- Lots of different obstacles, platforms and traps!
- An incredible soundtrack, with awesome musics and sounds!

The Last Hero

You are the last hope of this world, defeat your enemies and Rorudark to bring peace to this land. Use your abilities to climb walls, double jump, go through obstacles and jump across platforms in 10 different worlds, becoming The Last Hero!


Enemies


The game features 30 different enemies spread across 10 different worlds, plus an amazing boss fight against Rorudark! As the player progresses through the levels, the difficulty of the game and enemies increases and becomes more challenging!

data.short_description: Use your skills to double jump, crouch, climb wall, jump across platforms, defeat your enemies and save the world! You are the last hope to this land, go through challenging levels and defeat Rorudark to become The Last Hero!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, French*, Italian*, German*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Japanese*, Arabic*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHA
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
